response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $10,000 to me. However, I understand the importance of negotiation and am willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering its high value and the fact that it aligns perfectly with your business needs. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of collaborating with you on this exciting venture.", "product_price": 9500}
